ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Down there John, you explained it, however what you explained does not equal your answer.  Our invis song works against undead of just about all but see invis
ygData.messageBody:
Down there John, you explained it, however what you explained does not equal your answer. Our invis song works against undead of just about all but see invis types and the ones in Lower guk. That is not a need for invis to undead but a fix for the Lguk zone.. Or a clarification as to what they are.

I have tested with those who have invis to undead and standard invis.. Clouding -IS- invis plus invis to undead. There is just a quirk with Lguk

On Tue, 15 Feb 2000 16:53:22 +0000 eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> <sigh>
> I just explained this!!
>
> Sonorus Clouding does not work in Lower Guk, that is why it would be useful
> to have at level 39, you won't be needing to go deep into L guk until this
> level so it's about the right time to get it.
>
>
>
>
>
> firehawk@... on 15/02/2000 16:51:13
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Missing Songs!!
>
>
>
>
> From: firehawk@...
>
> This reminds me.. about invisibiloity.
>
> Bard invis work on undead at 26th level
> Unrest
> Befallen
> SK
> Lake Rathe
> Rathemtn
> Ferrott
> NRO
> EC
> Oasis
> SRO
> and some Kithkor
>
> Can anyone tell me why they thing we need a seperate invis to undead?
>
> On Tue, 15 Feb 2000 09:36:48 -0500 eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> > From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
> >
> > >
> > > Level 39: Invis to Undead (useful in Lower guk etc)
> > > Level 45: An upgraded Bellow/DD song (giving us better combat skills)
> >
> > These two I like.
> >
> > > Level 47: Summon Corpse song (like the necro one)
> >
> > I think they see this as a necro-only ability.
> >
> > > Level 49: Upgraded older song (such as charm) or a combo song (2
> effects
> > > such as hymm and clarity)
> >
> > Since I dont have half the songs yet (I am closing in on 20, don't have
> > the lvl 3 song, so 18 total), I don't know what we would need at these
> > higher levels, but I think an AOE stun would be pretty sweet for the
> > high level, maybe even make it mana dependent. The higher lvl charm
> > would be a definite plus...
> >
> > --
> > We now return to the non-stop rock.
> >
> > Matt DeBarger
> >
